addCollateral(uint256,address).details: updates cratiorequires that the token deposited can be valued by the escrow's oracle & the depositor has approved this contract- callable by anyone

params.amount: - the amount of collateral to add
params.token: - the token address of the deposited token

enableCollateral(address).details: - whitelisting protects against malicious 4626 tokens and DoS attacks       - only need to allow once. Can not disable collateral once enabled.

params.token: - the token to all borrow to deposit as collateral

returns._0: - the calculated collateral value to 8 decimals

liquidate(uint256,address,address).details: requires that the cratio is at or below the liquidation thresholdcallable by `loan`

params.amount: - the amount of tokens to liquidate
params.to: - the address to receive the funds
params.token: - the address of the token to draw funds from

params.amount: - the amount of collateral to release

enableCollateral(address).notice: - allows  the loans arbiter to  enable thdeposits of an asset        - gives  better risk segmentation forlenders

getCollateralValue().notice: calculates the collateral value in USD to 8 decimals

liquidate(uint256,address,address).notice: liquidates borrowers collateral by token and amount

releaseCollateral(uint256,address,addres.notice: remove collateral from your position. Must remain above min collateral ratio
